name: Under the next door
description:
Under the next door

The Player arrives at a motel in a remote area to rest, but quickly finds out that something is not right, but getting to safety isn’t going to be so easy.

This is my second horror game, it was made in around 2 weeks for a college project, it's not exactly how I wanted but it was the best  I could do with  the given deadline and loads of exams.

Controls:

  • Left Button Mouse - interact with objects
  • Space - jump
  • Left ctrl - crouch
  • F - Flashlight (When you have it)
  • ESC - pause game
  • WASD - walk 
  • SHIFT - run 

Made by:

roguetaver

antoniofuziy

Victor Vergara

Huge thanks to all creators that helped me with great assets!
